line: michael borkowpart ii teleplay by shana goldberg meehan scott silveripart ii story by jill condon amy toominpart i transcribed by eric aasenpart ii transcribed by aaron d
the flight leaves in four hours

when we get to london there could be a line at customs

y’know for remembering to pack a thing

my mom does it i never realized it was weird
yeah my mom used to put her head in the oven
well actually she only did it the one time
yeah in my third drawer on my dresser
you don’t want to lose that
okay if you need the vacuum it’s in my closet on the left hand side
ah the garbage bags are next to the refrigerator

yeah okay give that a try
okay ‘cause that’s not gonna get annoying
i guess we should get going
ohhh i wanna come over there and give you a hug and wish you luck on your wedding but i don’t can’t get up
oh i’ll i’ll come hug you
yeah could you bring me the newspaper
oh hey chandler i wanna hug you too
you might as well bring me my book it’s on the counter in your apartment
ugh i can’t believe you’re not gonna be there
it’ll mean so much to me
yeah well i gotta work i’m sorry
why why can’t you take a couple of days off
you’ll you’ll watch it on video when we get back
oh do you need a hug
you don’t have to bring me anything
i wanna be the on camera guy
all right first stop westminster abbey
oh what the hell is that
i’m gonna have to go into the map
okay if you see a little version of me in there
listen listen we’re not gonna have to walk this way the entire time are we
man you made me lose it
and that was all before 10 o’clock
the caterer rang and said it was going to be chicken kiev instead of chicken tarragon
and then the florist phoned to say there aren’t any tulips
oh and the chilliest has carpel tunel syndrome
doesn’t that sound delicious at the last minute
yeah y’know but something like salmon which would be so much more elegant than the chicken
and you wouldn’t have to worry about the salmonella
so i can’t wait to see this place you’re getting married
i still can’t believe they’re tearing it down
it really is the most lovely building you’ll ever see
i mean it’s over oh my god
what are we going to do
how’s it gonna be all right
okay i talked to the guy with the shovel and i found out what happened
they torn it down a few days early
hands down best abbey i’ve ever seen
what do you think of the abbey chandler
y’know they’re thinking of changing the name of this place
i am here to take care of you
so so what do you want for lunch
i guess we have to eat
i’m just bummed about the way i left things with ross
i shouldn’t have lied to him about having to work
he seemed so mad at me
eh don’t be so hard on yourself
if someone i was still in love with was getting married
i’m not in love with ross
phoebe i’m going to ross’s wedding because he is my ex boyfriend and that would be really uncomfortable
not because i’m still in love with him
i mean hey y’know i like ross as much as the next guy y’know
clearly i have feelings for him but feelings don’t mean love
i mean i still have loving feelings for ross
but i have i have continuing feelings of love but that doesn’t mean that that i’m still in love with him
i i have sexual feelings for him but i do love him ohh
oh my why didn’t you tell me
we talk about it all the time
oh no ross doesn’t know anything
oh i can not believe you didn’t tell me
well because we thought you knew
god that would be like telling monica hey you like things clean
so what are you guys in the market for
we’ve got uh scarves tulip post cards
well i don’t have to buy that i’m with stupid t shirt anymore
all right look you’re not really gonna buy that are you
don’t you think you’ve embarrassed me enough for one day
how can i answer that when i’m pretending i don’t know you
you’ll fit right in all londoners wear them
then how come no one here is wearing them
all right look if you insist on wearing that in public y’know you’re gonna spend the rest of the afternoon all by yourself
if you’re gonna make me choose between you and the hat
all right that’s it okay i’m out of here
i am not going to be embarrassed anymore
i just spoke to your dad and you know what
he seems to think we’ll be able to find a new place for the wedding
but monica and i were talking and and i was so upset about the hall being knocked down and she suggested that we put the wedding off for a bit
she said if i’m not gonna be happy getting married somewhere that we find in a day well then we should just postpone it
emily do you think monica realises how much our parents spent on this wedding
do you my sister’s teeny tiny little brain comprehends that people took time out of their lives to fly thousands of miles to be here huh
i realize that people are going to be disappointed
but i’m sure they’ll come back when we can do it right
i can’t ask people to do that
would you ask people to do that
don’t you point your pants at me
anywhere that’s half decent would’ve be booked months ago ross don’t you understand
this is our wedding i’m talking about
the only thing i understand is postponing it is not an option
this is when we’re getting married
what is wrong with these pants
and if and if you don’t understand how important this is to me well then perhaps we shouldn’t get married at all
so did shopping make you feel any better about ross
manhattan does not have enough stores
well i think i can help you get over him
i just need you to bring me some photos of ross
and a small piece of chocolate
and a glass of tepid water
ooh is this one of those things where you throw it in a bag with some graveyard dirt and hang it from a north facing tree
uh only if you have the hiccups too
yeah the pictures are for you the water and the chocolate is for me
i just didn’t feel like getting up
okay i’m gonna show you a picture of ross
and you’re going to remember all of the bad things about him
i certainly did it when we were going out
umm before we get started i just wanna say for the record that i love ross i think he’s such a great guy
and imagine that you’re with ross okay and imagine that you’re kissing him
and you’re you’re running your hands all over his body
and then you run your hands through his hair but eew oh gross it’s some kind of grease it’s uck
i don’t know his uh his hair never really bothered me that much and y’know it was always more crunchy than it was greasy
okay this is going to be harder than i thought
umm let’s try some uh aversion therapy
so uh now look at the picture
okay how do you feel now
i really shouldn’t have said that you were embarrassing me i mean that really wasn’t cool
and if it makes you feel any better i’ve had a really lousy day
i’ve had the best day ever
okay so say hi to my friend and tell him that you like the hat
okay so umm what’s your friend’s name
joey says you don’t really like his hat but i think it’s kinda dashing
well i was trying to figure out how to get to buckingham palace right
so i’m in my map and and hey
i understand you had a little talk with emily
and was it your idea to postpone the wedding
i’m gonna go to the bathroom
hey hey since you’re the ‘fix it’ lady here’s a pickle what do you do when the bride says she doesn’t want to have the wedding at all
i don’t know i told her it was stupid to put off the wedding just because the hall was gone and she liked flipped out
you’re even dumber than i am
ross how long have you been planning this wedding
emily has probably been planning it since she was five
ever since the first time she took a pillowcase and hung it off the back of her head
we dreamed about the perfect wedding and the perfect place with the perfect four tiered wedding cake with the little people on top
but the most important part is that we had the perfect guy who understood just how important all that other stuff was
and that that pillowcase thing i thought you guys were just doing the flying nun
you gotta help me figure out what to do
hey i hope ross didn’t think that we just went in there because we were uncomfortable being out here
i just say someone on the that looks just like you on the subway
and i was gonna go over and say ‘hi
’ but then i figured he doesn’t care if he looks like you
that just cost me four bucks
but uh listen i just called to see how the chick and the duck are doing
ohh they’re having a great time with their aunt phoebe
aunt rachel hasn’t been helpful at all
kinda but i’ve just been having way too much fun
all right the seven of us miss you
y’know me rachel the birds the babies
but y’know we were thinking about you y’know we ordered the joey special
okay gotta go talk to you later
wait well where did you get it from
monica why have you brought me here of all places
i tell you this wedding is not going to happen
but but imagine a lot more lights okay
and and y’know fewer bricks and and and flowers and candles
and the musicians look they can go over here okay
and the chairs can face this way and you go
but but if you don’t love this we’ll do it in any other place at any other time
really it’s fine whatever you want
and i don’t know if it starts to rain
and i don’t even have a date
do you remember where the duck food is
yeah it’s in the guys’ apartment under the sink
what do you mean you’re going to london
yeah i have to tell ross that i love him
now honey you take care you don’t have those babies until i get back
yeah i know i know i know he does
but i have to tell him how i feel
he deserves to have all the information and then he can make an informed decision
you’re going because you hope he’s gonna say yeah i love you too rach
ohh do you think he will
because he’s in love with the british chippy
look rachel if you go you’re just gonna mess with his head and ruin his wedding
i’m sorry i know this must be really hard it’s over
it’s not over until someone says i do
ugh like i can really chase you
and by the way young lady that is not how one addresses oneself on the telephone
first one identifies oneself and then asks for the person with whom one wishes to speak
i was wondering please if if it’s not too much trouble please umm might i speak to miss emily waltham please
miss waltham is at the rehearsal dinner and it’s not polite to make fun of people
no no no i’ll be nice i swear
could you just give me the number for where they are
i’m afraid i’m not at liberty to divulge that information
ok somebody is on their way to ruin wedding okay
and i have to warn somebody alright
so if you don’t give me that number then i’m going to come over there and kick your snooty ass all the way to new glocken
ohh ohh she knew i could kick her ass
oh sorry were late my fault i insisted on riding the tube
jack that’s what they call the subway
ohh here comes my dad and stepmum
mister and misses geller this is steven and andrea waltham
she’s very self absorbed you know
i should never have married her
well there’s one and there’s another
terribly nice of you to offer to pay for half the wedding
too hell with tradition we’re happy to do it
we know how expensive weddings can be besides this may be the only wedding we get to throw
ha ha a joke that’s funny in all countries
goat cheese water chestnuts and panchetta
i can’t even remember what phoebe looks like
joey it’s been three days okay
your just a little homesick okay
would you just try to relax
just just try to enjoy yourself
this bill for my half of the wedding
how could it be so much
i’m paying to remodel this guys house
i’m going to give that son on a bitch a piece of my mind
look i don’t want anything to upset emily tonight
alright she is had a hard enough couple of days as it is
now here here let me go talk to him okay
and you tell him no one takes advantage of the gellers
sometimes i forget how powerful you can be
and i’m going to go get drunk
umm when is your next flight to london
there’s one leaving in thirty minutes
and i do have one seat left
ohh thank you thank you thank you
the last minute fare on this ticket is twenty seven hundred dollars
ohh i just don’t think i have enough left on my credit card
well you can split it with another credit card
i’m just going to need to see your passport
i don’t have it but i can tell you exactly where it is on my night stand and
i have my drivers license and i have a twenty
look face it my father is not going to pay for the build in barbecue and believe me you can kiss you gazebo goodbye
now i might be able to get you the new lawn
ahh then you have to give us the lawn ornaments
i go back there with lawn ornaments he’s going to laugh in my face
i mean we had an agreement
don’t take that tone with me
oh look i know you probably want to be alone and you don’t want to talk about it that’s fine
i just want you to know i think you are doing the right thing and
why am i always pregnant when she does that
i’d like to toast ross and emily
of course my big toast will be tomorrow at the wedding so this is kind of my little toast or melba toast if you will
i known ross for a long time
in fact i knew him when he was going out with his first girlfriend
and i thought things were going to work out for him
until the day he over inflated her
i need to speak with ether one of the best men or ross’s sister monica
i’m one of ross’s best friends
well if you’re on e of ross’s best friends why aren’t you here
oh am i on the radio
umm could i talk to one of them
no i’m bored with you now
i’m going to cut you off
okay i’m going to have to kick her ass too
and i’m sure we’re all very excited that ross and emily are getting married at montgomery hall
i mean to think my friend getting married in monty hall
hey best man number two joey tribbiani
now i’m not good with the jokes like chandler here
but ahh i just want to say congratulation to the happy couple
i first met ross in this coffee house back home
well anyway i love you guys
but not as much as i love america
i was hoping to get to know you better
well i didn’t want everyone to think i was stupid
my mother’s driving me crazy but ross is getting married
i’m not going to let anything spoil that
i just want to say that ross is a wonderful young man
you must have been a teenage when you had him
there’s no way in hell i’m paying for it
look were down to just one point
could we please maybe just settle it after the wedding
all right fine but i just want to say i’m not paying for your wine cellar
you thieving would be speaking german if it weren’t for us cheap little man
there’s no way you look like ross’s mother
then why would he say it
he came up to me earlier and thanked me for my very moving performance in titanic
i’m never going to get married
i’m a single mom with a thirty year old son
i need to get on the 11 of the clock flight
oh i’m afraid that plane has already pulled away from the gate
okay you know what you’re going to have to call that plane and tell them to swing around and come and pick me up
come on we’ll just tell them that there was like a problem with like the engine
i’m afraid i’m going to have to ask you to step aside miss
look if i don’t get to london
he is going to marry that other girl
i am not leaving here until you call that plane back
he runs back out the door
do you think he knew i was here
well i’ve i’ve never done that with you before
if you’re planning on doing that throughout the entire flight
so that i could that a sedative
it’s just i’m ahh i’m kinda excited
i’m ahh going to london to ahh tell this guy that i love him and
hey were the hell have you been
i don’t want to hear about her
ahh pheebs you know you’re still my number one girl
no she’s coming to tell ross that she loves him
she’s going to ruin the wedding
okay so i’m done my part okay
the burden is off me right
so tell me about this girl
look we’ve got to find her
rachel’s coming to tell ross she loves him
that’s why we got to find monica
why don’t you just shine a light in my eyes
all this stuff i had been doing
proposing to joshua lying to ross about why i couldn’t come to the wedding
was all just a way of
you know i just want to say
that you are a horrible horrible person
you say you love this man yet you’re about to ruin the happiest day of his life
i’m afraid i have to agree with you friend pheebs
but he has to know how i feel
no good can come of this
well i i think your wrong
and by the way it seems to be perfectly clear that you were on a break
i know it’s horrible isn’t it
i only hope my wedding looks this good
you can let some of them go by
alright we really need to start looking out for rachel
you watch that big hole at the back of the building and i got chandler covering ross
why would i care where chandler is
you know sometimes i don’t even like chandler
umm i thought about you all day
talk new york to me again
we’re not paying for your wine cellar
you you have to meet me in the middle here
hey you keep pushing me on this my foots going to meet the middle of your ass
you want a piece of me sir
you want a piece of me
all right this is our wedding day
from now on everyone gets along and if i hear one more word
i could kill you with my thumb you know
you were not meant to see me before the wedding
you know what i think we’ve had all the bad luck we’re going to have
i just needed to tell you
can i please please please talk to one of the best men
this is going to be the last time i promise
joey there’s a girl on the phone for you
she just came in and gave him a hug that it
ohh so what’s going on now
ah i’m i’m walking down the aisle
i’m about to pass the bridesmaid i hooked up with last night
and now i’m at the front with ross
oh please hold it up so i can listen
what we did last night was
i’m coming over tonight though right
we are gathered to celebrate here today the joyous union of ross and emily
may the happiness we share with them today be with them always
as my lawfully wedded husband in sickness and in health till death parts us
